request.description:
- This api is used to get a particular operator details using an operator codes
    
- Maximum hits 50/day allowed for sync purposes only.
    
- List of Payment channels and payment mode supported by NPCI
    

| S No | Payment Mode | INT | INB | MOB | MBB | ATM | BNK | KSK | AGT | BSC |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Cash | N | N | N | N | N | Y | Y | Y | Y |
| 2 | Internet Banking | Y | Y | Y | Y | Y | N | N | N | N |
| 3 | Credit Card | Y | Y | Y | Y | Y | Y | Y | N | Y |
| 4 | Debit Card | Y | Y | Y | Y | Y | Y | Y | N | Y |
| 5 | Prepaid Card | Y | Y | Y | Y | Y | Y | Y | N | Y |
| 6 | IMPS | N | Y | N | Y | N | Y | N | N | Y |
| 7 | NEFT | N | Y | N | Y | Y | Y | N | N | Y |
| 8 | UPI | Y | Y | Y | Y | N | Y | N | N | Y |
| 9 | Wallet | Y | Y | Y | Y | N | Y | Y | N | Y |
| 10 | AEPS | N | N | N | N | N | Y | N | N | Y |
| 11 | Act Transfer | N | N | N | N | N | Y | N | N | N |
| 12 | Bharat QR | N | N | Y | Y | N | Y | N | N | Y |
| 13 | USSD | N | N | Y | Y | N | N | N | N | N |

HTML link: [https://www.kwikapi.com/Attachments/bbps_channel_support_30-10-2025.html](https://www.kwikapi.com/Attachments/bbps_channel_support_30-10-2025.html)

**Note:** The list has been provided by **NPCI**. We adhere to their **guidelines, instructions, and compliance policies** without modification.
